errors.404: That page could not be found

login.title: Login
login.existing: To get started, login with one of your existing accounts
login.local: Or login with you local account

register.title: Register for a new account
register.instruction: Enter your information in the form below. You will receive an email with a confirmation link. After visiting the confirmation link, your account is activated.
register.name: Your name
register.success: You have registered successfully. Please check your email to confirm this registration.

registrationconfirmation.title: Registration successfull
registrationconfirmation.content: You can now log in with the username and password you have created for this site.
